ProjectTitle: HURT: HabitUation and sensitization of aveRsive bodily sympToms: methods, mechanisms, and predictive value in real life
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/04/2024 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] privacy be a factor restricting sharing? [REDACTED] sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. [REDACTED] this is not the case please use RDR where you can restrict access, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard. [REDACTED] publishing in OSF please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (for RDR this is done automatically) see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
